name: Luna Clicker
description:
I kinda gave up on trying to make it look good after implementing the hop animation, lol.

Lore summary ( https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/38122731/#q38193109 ): Anon and Luna steal Celestia's cake. Sunbutt goes mad. Anon needs to save Luna from the moon.
